data.name: Hazard Ops: First Strike Pack
data.detailed_description:
BOOM! With this pack, your first shot will always be a bullseye. And as the first fights are often the hardest, no merc should hold anything back. Especially if they own this awesome pack.

With the QJY-88, you will have a real beast at hand. The two tech additions will make sure that you’ll never run out of bullets. And if you still manage to die somehow, you can still take advantage of the Revive Tokens and more XP.

Weapons

  • QJY-88 (Permanent)

Tech & Consumables

  • Auto Mag Loader (7 Days)
  • Spare Mag (7 Days)
  • 1x Double XP Boost (1 Day)
  • 5x Revive Token

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7600GT (must support Shader Model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core 2 Quad, i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
